name: Egyptian Magic - All Purpose Face, Body, and Dry Skin Moisturizing Cream, Skin Protectant for Women & Men, Eczema Care Healing Balm, Scar Treatment, Stretch Marks, and Tattoo Aftercare, 4oz Jar
short_description: MADE WITH PURE INGREDIENTS: Egyptian Magic Skin Cream is a premium blend of five ingredients - honey, royal jelly, beeswax, olive oil, and bee propolis. Rich in antioxidants and renowned for their nourishing and healing benefits.

VERSATILE SKINCARE SOLUTION: Use as a face moisturizer, lip balm, eye cream, highlighter, body cream, after-shave balm, and even a nourishing hair treatment. It doubles as a makeup remover, primer, tattoo aftercare, stretch mark cream, and eczema lotion for adults. Perfect for soothing diaper rashes, relieving sunburns, and addressing your countless skin care needs.

SOOTHES & HEALS: Provides relief for dry skin, cracked heels, and elbows, while reducing redness and irritation. Excellent for use as a burn healing cream, psoriasis relief, eczema balm, and skin moisturizer.

FORMULATED WITHOUT PARABENS: Carefully crafted without parabens, synthetic fragrances, or preservatives. This formula ensures gentle care for even the most delicate and sensitive skin. Making it a dependable choice for daily use on the face and body, as well as helping with specific skin concerns like eczema, dryness, and redness.

HYDRATING & REPAIRING: Delivers deep, long-lasting hydration to relieve flaky patches and sensitive areas. Egyptian Magic serves as a body moisturizer, a soothing cream, and an all-purpose solution for dryness on hands, face, and body.

INSPIRED BY ANCIENT SECRETS: Based on the ancient Egyptian formula that Cleopatra used to keep her skin glowing, Egyptian Magic is a legendary, multi-purpose pure ingredient balm that will leave your skin feeling nourished, healthy, and radiant!

name: Advanced Scar Gel, Silicone Scar Gel, Treats Old and New Scars, Reduces the Appearance of Scars from, Body, Face, Stretch Marks, Surgical Scar, Keloids, Acne, Burns and More, 50g (1.7 Oz)
short_description: SILICONE SHEET SCAR TREATMENT: This clinically-tested silicone scar gel is designed to treat and prevent scars. It helps reduce stretch marks caused by pregnancy and weight gain, as well as new and old scars from C-sections, surgeries, injuries, burns and acne.

CONVENIENT & DISCREET SCAR TREATMENT: The Silicone scar cream can reduce redness, itching, and discomfort. Apply this scar gel very thinly twice a day on the face, ears, neck, scalp, hands, joint areas, and other parts of the body. This smooth, non-greasy scar treatment is suitable for children or people with sensitive skin.

POWERFUL TRIPLE ACTION: Locks in to encourage collagen formation and cell renewal. Improves the color, size, and overall appearance of scars. The stretch mark cream helps soften, smooth, and reduce the appearance of scars. The scar gel helps make scars look softer, smoother, smaller, and less noticeable.

VISIBLE RESULTS WITH CONTINUOUS USE: This scar treatment works on newly healed wounds and visible old scars. Apply the scar cream 2-3 times a day. For new scars, results are seen in 8 weeks; for old scars, 3-6 months. Individual results may vary.

SAFETY & EFFICACY: We offer high-quality scar removal creams that are preservative-free, sulfate-free, and free of harmful chemicals, prioritizing safety and effectiveness to ensure the best results for your skin health.

name: Bio-Oil Skincare Set for Scars, Stretch Marks, and Dry Skin, 3 Pc Travel Size Kit Includes Skin Care Oil (2 oz), Dry Skin Gel (1.7 oz), and Body Lotion (5.7 oz), Pregnancy and Maternity Stretch Marks
short_description: SKINCARE GIFT SET - Contains Travel Size Bio-Oil Skin Care Oil, Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel, and Bio-Oil Body Lotion
HELPS IMPROVES APPEARANCE OF SCARS AND STRETCH MARKS - Dermatologist recommended and clinically proven for scars, stretch marks, uneven skin tone and so much more
HYDRATING DRY SKIN GEL - Clinically proven to improve extra dry skin with a unique formula that is easily and quickly absorbed by skin
ULTRA LIGHT MOISTURZING BODY LOTION — Bio-Oil Body Lotion's ‘Shake before use’ technology allows lotion to be ultralight, moisturizing skin
FORMULATED FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Helps soften skin for all types, tones, textures and safe for use on face and body and won't clog pores
product_description: The products in this Bio-Oil trial kit are Bio-Oil Skincare Oil (2 oz), Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel (1.7 oz), and Bio-Oil Body Lotion (5.9 oz). Made for all skin types, this Bio-Oil Skincare Oil can be used to help reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more. Its fast-absorbing, non-comedogenic formula won't clog pores. It helps the skin to retain essential moisture to soften skin and provide dry skin relief. It's truly a multiuse oil that's recommended by skin care specialists. Try Bio-Oil Dry Skin Gel to combat irritating dry skin and experience full body skin hydration. Our unique formula targets the top layer of skin to protect the moisture layer and soothe the skin. Bio-Oil’s specialist dry skin formula is easily absorbed by the skin and is composed of only 3 percent water. Our body oil for dry skin helps the skin to retain moisture. This product is suitable for dry and very dry skin types. The Bio-Oil Body Lotion is thinner than majority of currently available body lotions and has on average 2X the amount of oil. Our high-oil formula is infused with Shea Oil, Rosehip Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamins E & A. Bio-Oil Body Lotion hydrate and replenishes mild everyday dry skin, helping maintain the skin’s natural moisture balance.

name: Summer Fridays Babymoon Belly Balm - Nourishing Balm + Body Moisturizer Enriched with Calendula Oil + Vitamin E to Help Reduce the Appearance of Stretch Marks and Dry Skin (5 Fl Oz)
short_description: Babymoon Belly Balm - This safe and velvety body balm gently melts in to deeply moisturize, soothe and comfort stretching skin.

Key Ingredients - Formulated with a combination of Sunflower Seed and Avocado Oils, this intensely moisturizing duo is rich in omega-3 fatty acids, vitamins, and antioxidants to help support skin's moisture barrier.

Soothe & Hydrate Skin - Calendula oil, a light essential oil, helps to soothe and improve the comfort of stressed or overstretched skin. Vitamin E, a natural component of healthy skin, is known to encourage healing and helps to boost skin's elasticity.

How to Use - Massage into skin wherever extra-nourishing moisture and comfort is needed. Superconcentrated for maximum moisture, it's ideal for dry, stressed or overstretched skin—and our secret weapon against stretch marks. Tip: If pregnant, use morning and night for deep, soothing hydration. For best results, please store in a cool place (below 85° F/30° C). If your Babymoon Belly Balm does not gently squeeze out of the tube, we recommend running the tube under warm water for easy application.

Welcome to the world of Summer Fridays. Gentle, yet effective skincare and hybrid makeup essentials that make routines feel effortless and skin look luminous. Formulated to optimize skin and beauty, please the mind, and bring ease and softness to everyday life.

short_description: Contains 1- 3.4 Fluid Ounce Pump Bottle of Weleda Stretch Mark Pregnancy Massage Oil
Rich in vitamin E, a blend of wheat germ, almond, and jojoba oils reduces the appearance of stretch marks while nourishing the skin with rich moisture
Regular massage with this plant-rich oil diminishes the visible appearance of stretch marks and increases skin elasticity and smoothness

Our products are free from synthetic compounds or toxic chemicals. Instead, we use flower, fruit and root extracts, minerals and essential oils, each one carefully selected and orchestrated to work with your body’s own systems
Nourish your skin with rich plant oils that brighten your spirit and calm your mind. Experience our full range of plant-rich skincare
product_description: During pregnancy, your body needs extra tender care so you can feel well and enjoy what nature is doing. Weleda Stretch Mark Massage Oil uses ingredients to nurture your skin throughout your pregnancy. Sweet almond oil, vitamin E rich wheat germ oil and extract of arnica reduce the appearance of stretch marks while leaving skin feeling supple. The precious, soothing oils of rose, neroli, myrrh and frankincense unfold a complex perfume. It’s a pure formula in harmony with your body through a wondrous time. Weleda personal care products are dermatologically tested and free of synthetic fragrances, colors, preservatives and raw materials derived from mineral oils and never tested on animals. In Switzerland 1921, Weleda was founded on the belief that people are part of nature, grounded in a commitment to carefully orchestrate formulas that work with the body’s rhythms to awaken skin’s natural functions. Weleda is still creating those products today, that recognize the power of the natural world to balance mind, body and spirit allowing your beauty to shine through.
